import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useInput } from '../Data/useInput' function Dispensed() { const [StockLimit, setStockLimit] = useState('') const dispensedItems = [] const currentStock = { BCG: 320, DMR: 490, IPV: 170, VAT: 900, DBCG: 805 } const { value: vaccine, bind: bindVaccine, reset: resetVaccine } = useInput(''); const { value: child, bind: bindChild, reset: resetChild } = useInput(''); const { value: quantity, bind: bindQuantity, reset: resetQuantity } = useInput(''); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispensedItems.push({ "VaccineName": vaccine, "childVaccined": child, "stockQuantity": quantity }) resetVaccine() resetChild() resetQuantity() console.log(dispensedItems) } console.log(dispensedItems) return (

Dispensed Vaccines

Current Stock

{Object.entries(currentStock).map(key => ( ))}
Vaccine Name Vaccine Stock Quantity
{key[0]}{key[1]}
) } export default Dispensed
